definitions: A thing constituting a piece of evidence about the past, especially an account kept in writing or some other permanent form.
An official report of the proceedings and judgement in a court.
A number of related items of information which are handled as a unit.
The sum of the past achievements or performance of a person, organization, or thing.
The best performance or most remarkable event of its kind.
A thin plastic disc carrying recorded sound in grooves on each surface, for reproduction by a record player.
A piece or collection of music reproduced on a record or on another medium.
